lexUnit.name: artificial.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: made as a copy of something natural.

sentence.text: Such control will promote tight intra-system nutrient cycling and obviate to a degree the need for artificial fertilisers .
Artificial fertilisers and lime are used to improve the soils .
